details:
selftests/xsk: Avoid use-after-free on ctx

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit c5fab887f2086e4f79bfbaf7528261789530b4ba, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 39e940d4abfabb08b6937a315546b24d10be67e3. For more details please see the references link.
